events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to know how I can initiate a refund since the item does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer is seeking to return a product and get their money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase so I can check your order details and guide you on the refund steps?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and I bought the jacket on May 25th. I hope the refund process is straightforward.
Thank you for the details. I have located your order and you are eligible for a full refund. Please return the item using the prepaid label I will send to your email.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick response and that the return label will be provided. I will send the jacket back as soon as I receive it.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the returned jacket, the refund will be processed promptly within 5 business days.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and to ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund case has been closed as the returned jacket was received and the refund processed successfully. Thank you for your cooperation.
